projects.title: HOME APP
projects.description: An App that uses APIs to get the latest rates, instant mortgage rate and interest numbers, and relevant housing market news.

projects.title: WEATHER FORECAST
projects.description: A Web App for you to check the current weather forecast and up to five days for any city in a simple and hassle-free way.

projects.title: TEAM PROFILE GENERATOR
projects.description: A powerful tool that makes it easy to create custom team profile pages via the command line, automating the process, saving time and effort.

projects.title: README GENERATOR
projects.description: A useful tool helping you quickly create informative and well-structured READMEs for your projects, right from the command line.

projects.title: WORKDAY SCHEDULER
projects.description: A Web App for you to organize your workday by hour, inserting some notes your way, which can be edited and cleaned whenever you want.

projects.title: PASSWORD GENERATOR
projects.description: Generate passwords between 8 and 128 characters, which can contain numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters and special characters.
